name: To The Sea (Dennis1543, safdarzareef)
description:
In this 3D physics-based simulation game, take control of a melting glacier racing down a mountain on its quest to get to the sea! With the power of the mighty river you are creating on your way down, restore the balance of the world by reviving your plant allies, destroying polluting buildings, and revitalizing what is left of the land for nature.

Credits

Raging Tributaries

  • Adeel Nordin
  • Emily "Moon" Kline
  • Nameer Hirschkind
  • Taylor Snyder
  • Zareef Safdar
